summary: Bretons, Imperials, Nords, and Redguards now sound like the hero you always knew you were.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[youtube]gGL-qoyxThM[/youtube]
An actual (non-cancerous or shitty meme) demonstration video will be produced shortly.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/79700-0-1477427699.jpg[/img]

[size=3][u][size=6]Details:[/size][/u]

I always thought the default player voice for Human races was too high. It was always a bit deflating to hear my character go "HyaAAH!" like a pre-pubescent baby Link. Bretons, Imperials, Nords, and Redguards now sound like the hero you've always known you were (MAMA WAS RIGHT). Nords & Redguards have Orc default player voice. Bretons & Imperials have High Elf default player voice. Feel free to comment and request other voice defaults (i.e. request for Nords to have default High Elf voice in separate mod version)[/size]
[u]

[/u][size=3]All player voice sounds have been changed to sound more masculine, including shouts, and your usual combat grunts.

[/size][size=6][u]Installation:

[/u][/size][size=3]Drag the file into your data folder & enable it in your launcher.


[/size][size=6][b]Testicmonials[u]:[/u][/b]

[font=Courier New][i]"Is good" ~ Huffington Post[/i][/font]
[/size][/center]
author: EhudTV
